name: chrome-app-harness
description: The Chrome Apps Developer Tool ("Chrome ADT" for short) is a distribution of [Apache Cordova App Harness](https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf/cordova-app-harness.git) that can run Chrome Apps. It is based on the plugins from the [cca](https://github.com/MobileChomeApps/mobile-chrome-apps) toolkit.
